description:
Performance in disguise: their men's Prospect Heights Graphic Short Sleeve is made to move. Where exactly? From the studio to the store, cross fit to the coffee shop, and everywhere in between.

Built with comfortable 4-way stretch and moisture-wicking properties, this unassuming workout top delivers technical performance when you need it, and plenty of everyday style when you don’t.
name: Prana Prospect Heights Graphic SS - Mens
